-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Please see the README on GitHub at
--   <a>https://github.com/SebTee/how-monochromatic#readme</a>
@package how-monochromatic
@version 0.1.0.0


-- | Library for handling bi-coloured graphs
module BCG

-- | Bi-Coloured Graph
data BCG
BCG :: [BCE] -> IntSet -> Int -> BCG

-- | Bi-Coloured Edge
data BCE
BCE :: Int -> Int -> Int -> Int -> Complex Double -> BCE

-- | From Vertex
[fromV] :: BCE -> Int

-- | From Colour
[fromC] :: BCE -> Int

-- | To Vertex
[toV] :: BCE -> Int

-- | To Colour
[toC] :: BCE -> Int

-- | Weight
[w] :: BCE -> Complex Double

-- | Get a list of <a>BCE</a>s connected to a vertex
getIncidentEdges :: BCG -> Int -> [BCE]

-- | Determines if a vertex is connected to an <a>BCE</a>
isIncident :: Int -> BCE -> Bool

-- | Removes a vertex and the connected <a>BCE</a>s from a <a>BCG</a>
removeVertex :: BCG -> Int -> BCG

-- | Removes a list of vertices and their connected <a>BCE</a>s from a
--   <a>BCG</a>
removeVertices :: BCG -> [Int] -> BCG
instance GHC.Show.Show BCG.BCE
instance GHC.Show.Show BCG.BCG


-- | Library for parsing strings into <a>BCG</a>
module ParseBCG

-- | Parse a string into <a>BCG</a>
parse :: String -> Either (ParseException, Int) BCG

-- | Exceptions returned by the parser
data ParseException

-- | The line has an incorrect number of parameters
IncorrectNumberOfParameters :: ParseException

-- | The real or imaginary part of the complex number couldn't be parsed
--   into <a>Double</a>
ComplexNumberParseFailure :: ParseException
instance GHC.Show.Show ParseBCG.ParseException
instance GHC.Show.Show ParseBCG.BCEToken
